items.description: Download all 21 job icons locally to /icons/ directory and update URLs in JOBS array to use local paths instead of XIVAPI
acceptance_criteria: All 21 job icons exist in /icons/ directory
JOBS array URLs point to icons/{job}.png
All icons display correctly including Viper and Pictomancer
steps_to_verify: Start local server on port 8080
Open index.html in browser
Add a character and click Add Job
Verify all 21 job icons load without fallback text

items.description: Fix gear table column alignment so Raid/Tome badges, turn/cost labels, and checkboxes align vertically across all rows in both columns
acceptance_criteria: Type badges (Raid/Tome) align vertically in both left and right columns
Turn labels and tome costs align vertically
Checkboxes align vertically across all rows
steps_to_verify: View gear table with a character that has both raid and tome slots
Visually confirm columns align between left side (Weapon through Feet) and right side (Earrings through Ring 2)

items.description: Change 'drop' to 'Coffer' (capital C) throughout the raid drops summary section
acceptance_criteria: Section heading reads 'Raid Coffers Needed' not 'Raid Drops Needed'
Summary items show 'X Coffer' or 'X Coffers' not 'X drop' or 'X drops'
Empty state reads 'All raid coffers obtained!' not 'All raid drops obtained!'
steps_to_verify: View summary panel with raid gear needed
Verify 'Coffer' terminology in heading and counts
Obtain all raid gear and verify empty state message
